fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Water Gun: Attack a player.
- Tail Whip: Lower a player's defense by 1 tier for 3 nights. If they currently have None defense, their defense becomes Vulnerable. This effect fails on players with Vulnerable defense.
- Evolve: Evolve into Quagsire. May only be used once Tail Whip has caused a player's death.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Defensive(?) Typing: You have Basic defense from all attacks, except for a randomly chosen non-Pokemon role in the game that is capable of visiting others. You will know what this role is, but not the player that has this role. If this role visits you, your base defense becomes Vulnerable for the night.

fields.name: Pokemon Ability:
fields.value: - Unaware: Your attacks ignore provided defense, i.e. defense that is not in a player's innate attributes. This includes things such as the Doctor's heals (58) and the WM Trapper's traps (176).
